title: Smartphone X12
description: A cutting-edge smartphone with a 6.7-inch OLED display, 128GB storage, and 48MP triple cameras.

title: Wireless Headphones YB200
description: High-quality wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30 hours of battery life.

description: A powerful gaming laptop featuring an Intel i9 processor, 32GB RAM, and NVIDIA RTX 4080 graphics card.

description: A 55-inch QLED 4K smart TV with HDR10 support and built-in streaming apps.

description: Fitness-focused smart watch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 7-day battery life.

description: A portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, waterproof design, and 12-hour battery life.

description: A versatile tablet with a 10.5-inch display, 8GB RAM, and support for digital pen input.

title: Home Assistant Hub HA300
description: A smart home assistant with voice control, smart lighting integration, and music playback.
